column1: #Text=Morinville is a city of about 10,000 people ( 2016 ) in the Edmonton Capital Region .
#Text=One of the town 's larger businesses , Champion Pet Foods , employs approximately 50 people .

#Text=Morinville was settled by Father Morin , an Oblate missionary , who brought many French settlers in the late 1800s , followed by several German pioneers — hence its many French and German families such as Hittinger , Riopel , Boissonnault , Tailleur , Houle , Labonté , St. Laurent , Maisonneuve , Bokenfohr , Krauskopf , Rustemier , and Meyers .
#Text=The monument in the St. Jean Baptiste Park lists the many names of pioneers and settlers to Morinville .
#Text=Morinville is 36 km northwest of Edmonton along Highway 2 .
#Text=There are buses from Edmonton to St. Albert .
#Text=Morinville is a $ 40 - 50 taxi trip from St. Albert .
#Text=The Roman Catholic Church of the St. Jean Baptiste Parish , 10020 100 Ave. Built in 1907 .
#Text=The church , along with its adjacent but now inoperative convent Morinville Convent , was declared a historical site in 1975 .

#Text=Recreation amenities in Morinville include walking trails , a splash park , a trout pond , a skateboard park , a hockey arena , a curling rink , numerous parks and playgrounds , and outdoor fitness equipment stations along the trail system and at the splash park .
#Text=A fun-filled weekend in Morinville including a midway , children 's activities , Show ' n Shine , parade , and entertainment .
#Text=Morinville Hotel & Suites , 10219 100 Avenue ( just off Highway 2 at Hwy 642 ) , toll-free : +1 780-939-3111 .
#Text=Morinville RV Park , 55529 Range Road 255 , Sturgeon County ( just west of town on Main Street ) , ☏ +1 780-939-6040 .
#Text=54 Serviced sites plus large over-flow area .
#Text=A few minutes walk to get to the centre of Morinville .
#Text=The little lake is stocked with fish .
#Text=Fire Pits on most sites ( wood cost is $ 10 a bundle ) .
